data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

In your first instructions, you always face forward and face backward. If you always face forward and face left, you can get 10 steps forward and 10 steps left. You take 9 steps left and take 10 steps forward. If you always face right, you take 9 steps right and take 10 steps backward. Your first instructions tell you that you always take forward steps. So, the answer is Yes.

Taking a negative step is said to be reversing a direction. Taking a positive step is said to be returning to the starting point. So, the answer is yes.
